mapper.sql: id, name, sex, age, create_time, update_time, status
mapper.insert: insert into user (id, name, sex, age, create_time, update_time, status) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into user
id,
name,
sex,
age,
create_time,
update_time,
status,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},

#{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update user
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
